channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 2021年末碎碎念
item.description: 入冬了在家是真的好冷，暖气聊胜于无，穿两三层还是会手脚冰凉 记录一下部署blog中遇到的一些问题 建好仓库准备push的时候遇到[fatal: The current branch master has no upstream branch. To push the current branch and set the remote as upstream, use git push –set-upstream origin master] 随后用 git push -u origin master给报了 fatal: unable to access ‘https://github.com/wsmnwc/wsmnwc.github.io.git/': gnutls_handshake() failed: The TLS connection was non-properly terminated. 看来是网络问题，于是配置代理 $ git config –global https.https://github.com.proxy https://127.0.0.1:7890 $ git config –global http.https://github.com.proxy http://127.0.0.1:7890 之后又出现 [remote: Support for password authentication was removed on August 13, 2021.
